import React from 'react' import products from '../products' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/rating' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find(m => m._id === match.params.id ) return ( Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen;
